review_blob: I had my doubts at first, since this is a fruit beer, but after drinking I realized that its quite good. Light, refreshing taste, goes down smooth, gives a relaxing buzz. Excellent for a warm summer day.
Excellent beer...goes well with a lime in it. NOt usually a fan of darker beer, but this is very smooth and tasty

Slightly skunky smell, not too much head when poured in a glass. This beer, however, is best served straight from the bottle. Best served quite cold.  Overall taste is quite good, is non-offensive in anyway, and good to the last sip.  Not the best beer I've ever had, but a decent green bottle brew

This beer is disgusting. It's ultra low price does not make me want to get any, ever.  Tried to drink this once, and was immediately put off by the smell. Forced myself to take a sip and was utterly appalled by the disgusting taste. Id rather spend a few bucks and get couple 40's than a case of this junk.
